org.springframework.vault.core

Interface VaultSysOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VaultSysTemplate

    public interface VaultSysOperations
    Interface that specifies a basic set of administrative Vault operations.
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Method Summary

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
               throws VaultException
        Returns:
        true if Vault is initialized.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        GET /sys/init

      • initialize

        VaultInitializationResponse initialize(VaultInitializationRequest vaultInitializationRequest)
                                throws VaultException
        Initialize Vault with a VaultInitializationRequest.
        Parameters:
        vaultInitializationRequest - must not be null.
        Returns:
        the VaultInitializationResponse.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        PUT /sys/init

   throws VaultException

      • unseal

        VaultUnsealStatus unseal(String keyShare)
                  throws VaultException
        Unseal vault. See VaultUnsealStatus.getProgress() for progress.
        Parameters:
        keyShare - must not be empty and not null.
        Returns:
        the VaultUnsealStatus.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        PUT /sys/unseal

      • mount

        void mount(String path,
           VaultMount vaultMount)
    throws VaultException
        Mounts a secret backend VaultMount to path.
        Parameters:
        path - must not be empty or null.
        vaultMount - must not be null.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        POST /sys/mounts/{mount}

      • getMounts

        Map<String,VaultMount> getMounts()
                          throws VaultException
        Returns:
        Map of all secret backend mounts.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        GET /sys/mounts/

      • unmount

        void unmount(String path)
      throws VaultException
        Unmounts the secret backend mount at path.
        Parameters:
        path - must not be empty or null.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        DELETE /sys/mounts/{mount}

        void authMount(String path,
               VaultMount vaultMount)

        Parameters:
        path - must not be empty or null.
        vaultMount - must not be null.
        Throws:
        VaultException
        See Also:
        POST /sys/auth/{mount}
